job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As a Back-End Developer at Watermelon, you focus on ensuring the stability and reliability of our AI messaging systems together with implementing new API's., As a Back-End Developer at Watermelon, you are responsible for developing and maintaining the server-side of Watermelon. You work closely with the Front-End team to implement functionality and integrate it with the user interface. You take pride in the quality of your code and are open to feedback from the team., * Integrating APIs and working with various microservices, constantly striving for improvements.
     * Operating in a fast-paced Continuous Integration & Deployment environment.
     * Working in GitHub and writing automated tests to ensure high code quality.
     * Assisting colleagues and yourself through pull requests, code reviewing, and pair programming.
     * Monitoring platform performance and analyzing ways to enhance it.
     * Contemplating technical choices, such as architecture, tools, and processes., * A flexible remote work policy and working in Utrecht, ideally you also live near Utrecht
     * Travel allowance, pension plan, and a budget for personal development
     * 25 vacation days and a budget to set up your workspace.
     * A culture focused on growth and development
     * The opportunity to contribute to a fast-growing international startup in the AI industry
     * Room for new initiatives and idea
     * A friendly work atmosphere with colleagues you can laugh with and participate in events and team activities
job_details.full_text:
Senior Backend Developer

As a Back-End Developer at Watermelon, you focus on ensuring the stability and reliability of our AI messaging systems together with implementing new API's., As a Back-End Developer at Watermelon, you are responsible for developing and maintaining the server-side of Watermelon. You work closely with the Front-End team to implement functionality and integrate it with the user interface. You take pride in the quality of your code and are open to feedback from the team., * Integrating APIs and working with various microservices, constantly striving for improvements.
     * Operating in a fast-paced Continuous Integration & Deployment environment.
     * Working in GitHub and writing automated tests to ensure high code quality.
     * Assisting colleagues and yourself through pull requests, code reviewing, and pair programming.
     * Monitoring platform performance and analyzing ways to enhance it.
     * Contemplating technical choices, such as architecture, tools, and processes., * A flexible remote work policy and working in Utrecht, ideally you also live near Utrecht
     * Travel allowance, pension plan, and a budget for personal development
     * 25 vacation days and a budget to set up your workspace.
     * A culture focused on growth and development
     * The opportunity to contribute to a fast-growing international startup in the AI industry
     * Room for new initiatives and idea
     * A friendly work atmosphere with colleagues you can laugh with and participate in events and team activities

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on traditional backend development tasks such as API integration, microservices, CI/CD, and automated testing. While it mentions 'AI messaging systems' and the 'AI industry', it lacks specific details about developing, fine-tuning, or deploying AI models, which are core to ML or GenAI Engineer roles.

phrases: implementing new API's
developing and maintaining the server-side
implement functionality and integrate it with the user interface
Integrating APIs and working with various microservices
Operating in a fast-paced Continuous Integration & Deployment environment
Working in GitHub
writing automated tests to ensure high code quality
Assisting colleagues and yourself through pull requests, code reviewing, and pair programming
Monitoring platform performance and analyzing ways to enhance it
Contemplating technical choices, such as architecture, tools, and processes
job_tasks.justification: These phrases describe core backend software engineering activities, including API development, server-side logic, integration, CI/CD, testing, code reviews, and performance monitoring, which are all part of building and maintaining software applications.

phrases: ensure the stability and reliability of our AI messaging systems
contribute to a fast-growing international startup in the AI industry
Room for new initiatives and idea
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate an understanding of the business context (AI messaging systems, startup growth) and an openness to new ideas, aligning with understanding business needs and contributing to strategic goals.

phrases: Operating in a fast-paced Continuous Integration & Deployment environment
Monitoring platform performance and analyzing ways to enhance it
job_tasks.justification: While not explicitly MLOps, CI/CD and platform performance monitoring are key components of operations engineering, focused on the deployment and maintenance of systems.
